channel.title: Spec help
channel.description: Can someone help me make a spec. I was going to just edit the Dragon Battleaxe spec, but I cant seem to find it in my source, it is in the game. Can someone tell me how I can edit it and make it for D battle axe and my other wep?

item.title: Spec help
item.dc:creator: @Danielplanto Danielplanto
item.description:
@Danielplanto wrote:

I put it inside of Clickingmost.java, right below the dbaxe. | And In special.java, i added the Case 13515: so it wud have the special bar. so i have the special bar it just doesnt do like the dbaxe.

Read full topic

item.title: Spec help
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

[quote=“Danielplanto, post:12, topic:363936”]I wanted to create a spec for my new barrows whip based off the dbaxe spec, but it does not work at all, I click the special bar and it doesn’t do like the DBAXE, this is how the code looks.

case 29063://axes if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 1377 && c.specialAmount <= 99) {//dba c.sM("You do not have enough special energy left."); } if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 1377 && c.specialAmount >= 100) {//dba c.strPot = true; c.strPotTimer = 20; c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]); c.cba = c.abc / 10; c.abc2 = c.cba * 2; if (c.abc2 <= 1) { c.abc2 = 2; } c.playerLevel[2] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]); c.playerLevel[2] += c.abc2; c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[2]+"", 4006); c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.setAnimation(1670); c.lowGFX(246, 0); c.specialAmount -= 100; c.specTimer = 70; c.plrText = "Raarrrrrgggggghhhhhhh!"; c.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; } c.specAttack(); //Barrows Whip if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 13515 && c.specialAmount <= 99) { //Barrows Whip c.sM("You do not have enough special energy left."); } if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 13515 && c.specialAmount >= 100) { //Barrows Whip c.strPot = true; c.strPotTimer = 50; c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]); c.cba = c.abc / 10; c.abc2 = c.cba * 2; if (c.abc2 <= 1) { c.abc2 = 2; } c.attPot = true; c.attPotTimer = 50; c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]); c.cba = c.abc / 15; c.abc2 = c.cba * 2; if (c.abc2 <= 1) { c.abc2 = 2; } c.defPot = true; c.defPotTimer = 50; c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.cba = c.abc / 15; c.abc2 = c.cba * 2; if (c.abc2 <= 1) { c.abc2 = 2; } c.playerLevel[2] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]); c.playerLevel[2] += c.abc2; c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[2]+"", 4006); c.playerLevel[0] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]); c.playerLevel[0] += c.abc2; c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[0]+"", 4004); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.playerLevel[1] += c.abc2; c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[1]+"", 4008); c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.setAnimation(1670); c.lowGFX(246, 0); c.specialAmount -= 100; c.specTimer = 70; c.plrText = "Power..flowing..thru..veins!!"; c.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; } c.specAttack(); break;

Any help please? Im stumped.

I also tried making them “exactly” the same (except for the ID’s being different) and for some reason It STILL does not work!

help :([/quote]
Did you add it to Special.java and declare it in Clickingmost.java

Read full topic

item.title: Spec help
item.dc:creator: @Danielplanto Danielplanto
item.description:
@Danielplanto wrote:

I wanted to create a spec for my new barrows whip based off the dbaxe spec, but it does not work at all, I click the special bar and it doesn’t do like the DBAXE, this is how the code looks.

case 29063://axes if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 1377 && c.specialAmount <= 99) {//dba c.sM("You do not have enough special energy left."); } if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 1377 && c.specialAmount >= 100) {//dba c.strPot = true; c.strPotTimer = 20; c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]); c.cba = c.abc / 10; c.abc2 = c.cba * 2; if (c.abc2 <= 1) { c.abc2 = 2; } c.playerLevel[2] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]); c.playerLevel[2] += c.abc2; c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[2]+"", 4006); c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.setAnimation(1670); c.lowGFX(246, 0); c.specialAmount -= 100; c.specTimer = 70; c.plrText = "Raarrrrrgggggghhhhhhh!"; c.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; } c.specAttack(); //Barrows Whip if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 13515 && c.specialAmount <= 99) { //Barrows Whip c.sM("You do not have enough special energy left."); } if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 13515 && c.specialAmount >= 100) { //Barrows Whip c.strPot = true; c.strPotTimer = 50; c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]); c.cba = c.abc / 10; c.abc2 = c.cba * 2; if (c.abc2 <= 1) { c.abc2 = 2; } c.attPot = true; c.attPotTimer = 50; c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]); c.cba = c.abc / 15; c.abc2 = c.cba * 2; if (c.abc2 <= 1) { c.abc2 = 2; } c.defPot = true; c.defPotTimer = 50; c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.cba = c.abc / 15; c.abc2 = c.cba * 2; if (c.abc2 <= 1) { c.abc2 = 2; } c.playerLevel[2] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]); c.playerLevel[2] += c.abc2; c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[2]+"", 4006); c.playerLevel[0] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]); c.playerLevel[0] += c.abc2; c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[0]+"", 4004); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.playerLevel[1] += c.abc2; c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[1]+"", 4008); c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.setAnimation(1670); c.lowGFX(246, 0); c.specialAmount -= 100; c.specTimer = 70; c.plrText = "Power..flowing..thru..veins!!"; c.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; } c.specAttack(); break;

Any help please? Im stumped.

I also tried making them “exactly” the same (except for the ID’s being different) and for some reason It STILL does not work!

help

Read full topic

Pblord7:

Can someone help me make a spec. I was going to just edit the Dragon Battleaxe spec, but I cant seem to find it in my source, it is in the game. Can someone tell me how I can edit it and make it for D battle axe and my other wep?
